document.full_text: u.s. district judge susan richard nelson denied the n.f.l.'s request to put her ruling on hold and guaranteed more limbo for the $9 billion business.
document.title: judge denies n.f.l. request to freeze lockout ruling
lines_and_colors: u.s. district judge susan richard nelson denied the n.f.l.'s request to put her ruling on hold and guaranteed more limbo for the $9 billion business.
